title: How to Change Lot Zoning in the Sims 2 Bon Voyage

steps.title: Create a lot and make either a residential or community lot.
steps.content: Create a lot and make either a residential or community lot.

steps.title: Save your game, exit to the neighborhood.
steps.content: Save your game, exit to the neighborhood.

steps.title: Click on the lot and where it says what type of lot zoning it is, it should now say 'Lodging'.
steps.content: Click on the lot and where it says what type of lot zoning it is, it should now say 'Lodging'.
